summary: The silent aftermath of a young woman's disaster is broken by her discovery of nature's old rhythms.
cast: Rifka Lodeizen|Wim Opbrouck|Chris Borowski|Elisabeth van Nimwegen|Tina de Bruin|Mattijn Hartemink|Roel Goudsmit|Anita Donk|Hans Zuydveld|Jeroen van Wijngaarden|Serafien Rijckaert
title: Kan door huid heen
